wikipedia_page.main: Eric George Lee (18 October 1922 – 2012) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender. He has made the fourth most Football League appearances for Chester, with 363 such appearances made from 1946 to 1957. He also played for Great Britain at the 1948 Summer Olympics.

response: Mills is a supporter of Leyton Orient and is frequently mentioned in his radio broadcasts, he has also written a regular column in the Leyton Orient matchday programme. His uncle Eric Lee played in The Football League for Chester City.'Bob Mills', Leyton Orient vs. Chester City matchday programme, 23 April 2005, pg. 49
